Bunty makes ‘Pohe’ !

@ Takes a bowl of ‘pohe’.
C ) Heats some oil in a pan.
@ Washes them well.
Covers the pan with a lid.
@ Puts mustard seeds, ‘hing’ and turmeric powder in the oil.
C ) Cuts the onion and the chilli into small pieces.
